CustomProfile.Description: Action Deka is a motion‑controlled action game by Konami that blends light‑gun shooting with beat ’em up mechanics. Using a multifunction action controller, players mimic shooting, punching, throwing and even driving actions. Push the controller forward like a gun to blast enemies, or shake it to unleash quick jabs and hooks; other motions simulate tossing objects or steering vehicles. The game challenges you to physically act out attacks, making it a unique fusion of arcade shooting and brawling.
